name: Light Of Fey
description:
A short first person Adventure RPG.

You are a mortal with a powerful artifact, however the hex is upon you.

Objectives : Goal of each level is to unlock the door by making the undead fall off the platforms. The first Lantern ability [LMB]  is used for maneuvering the platforms by identifying which ones are stable. The second Lantern ability [RMB]  will cause the undead to be "allured" often making them walk over the unstable platforms which they normally ignore. Once all the undead are disposed, the door will turn from red to blue indicating it has been unlocked.

Created for the 2021 EpicMegajam.
